product_name: The North Face TKA 80 Quarter-Zip Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The technical TKA 80 Quarter-Zip Top from The North Face gives you a lightweight buffer of warmth that won't restrict arm motion when you're running on cold days. Polyester microfleece fabric is soft and warm. Body-mapped stretch mesh panels down the sides and back accelerate the movement of moisture to keep you dry and warm. The quarter-zip neck provides extra coverage when fully zipped, or quick ventilation when unzipped. Reflective trim throughout keeps you visible while running on the trails or the road after dusk. Stash energy gels or car keys in the zippered pocket on the upper left arm. Closeout.
short_description: The technical TKA 80 Quarter-Zip Top from The North Face gives you a lightweight buffer of warmth that won't restrict arm motion when you're running on cold days.
